properties.entry: SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PWD , ADMIN_NICKNAME , ADMIN_STATUS FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ? AND ADMIN_PWD = ? AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS != 'N' AND TRUNC(M_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS != 'N' AND SUBSTR(M_RRN,7)IN(1,3)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS != 'N' AND SUBSTR(M_RRN,7)IN(2,4)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - CASE WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN 1900 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN 2000 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) END ) BETWEEN 0 AND 19

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - CASE WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN 1900 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN 2000 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) END ) BETWEEN 20 AND 29

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - CASE WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN 1900 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN 2000 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) END ) BETWEEN 30 AND 39

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - CASE WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN 1900 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) WHEN SUBSTR(M_RRN, 7, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN 2000 + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M_RRN, 1, 2)) END ) >= 40
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM QUESTION WHERE Q_ANSWER = 'N' AND Q_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT M_ID ,M_NAME ,M_REPORT ,M_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE (M_ID LIKE ? OR M_NAME LIKE ?) AND ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT POST_NO ,M_NAME ,POST_TITLE FROM POST JOIN MEMBER USING (M_NO) WHERE (POST_TITLE LIKE ? OR M_NAME LIKE ?) AND ROWNUM <= 5;
SELECT Q_NO ,M_NAME ,Q_TITLE FROM QUESTION JOIN MEMBER USING (M_NO) WHERE (Q_TITLE LIKE ? OR M_NAME LIKE ?) AND ROWNUM <= 5;
